column4: Hey, I managed to get my Linux working properly, configured router, everything is good so far. But I'm a complete Linux newbie and I'm trying to install AMSN.. I'm in the root terminal with the apt-get install.. but it's saying package can't be found. Every time.
better to use synaptic.  it has a nice easy to use GUI interface to apt-get
I don't think I have synaptic..
